name: Ana the Stalwart
description: Sozet, a digital trading card game. The rules are simple and make use of the D20 system. Roll a D20 and add your ATK value to determine who goes first. During your turn you play one spell or item card, it takes effect before your attack. Attack your target by rolling a D20 and adding the ATK modifier, if the total value is higher than the targets AC, you deal DMG to the targets HP. When HP reaches 0, the hero is dead. Last player alive is the victor!
